root.title: Azure Service Principal Created
root.description: Identifies when a service principal is created in Azure.
root.author: Austin Songer @austinsonger

falsepositives.item: Service principal being created may be performed by a system administrator.
Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment.
Service principal created from unfamiliar users should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
